com.edu.serviceimpl

类 UserRoleServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.edu.base.BaseServiceImpl<UserRole>
      • com.edu.serviceimpl.UserRoleServiceImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IBaseService<UserRole>, IUserRoleService

    @Lazy(value=true)
@Transactional
@Service(value="userRoleService")
public class UserRoleServiceImpl
extends BaseServiceImpl<UserRole>
implements IUserRoleService
